hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Magic Meter#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Hookshot#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Deku Shield#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Magic Meter#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say Ganondorf's bolts can be reflected with glass or steel.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #a Red Rupee# can be found at #Zora's River#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a #generic grotto#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Goron Tunic#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: Have you found all 41 Gossip Stones?^Only 40 of us give hints.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Zelda's Lullaby#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Fire Temple#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #the Iron Boots#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Hallway Left Invisible Chest

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Deku Stick Capacity#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #the Desert Colossus# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #lighting flames in the royal tomb# rewards #the Prescription#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #the Kokiri Sword#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Zelda's Lullaby#.
